sn55.40:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṃ nigrodhārāme.
sn55.40:4.2: Atha kho nandiyo sakko yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn55.40:4.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho nandiyo sakko bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn55.40:4.5: “yasseva nu kho, bhante, ariyasāvakassa cattāri sotāpattiyaṅgāni sabbena sabbaṃ sabbathā sabbaṃ natthi sveva nu kho, bhante, ariyasāvako pamādavihārī”ti.
sn55.40:5.1: “‘Yassa kho, nandiya, cattāri sotāpattiyaṅgāni sabbena sabbaṃ sabbathā sabbaṃ natthi tamahaṃ bāhiro puthujjanapakkhe ṭhito’ti vadāmi.
sn55.40:5.2: Api ca, nandiya, yathā ariyasāvako pamādavihārī ceva hoti, appamādavihārī ca taṃ suṇāhi, sādhukaṃ manasi karohi;
sn55.40:5.4: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho nandiyo sakko bhagavato paccassosi.
sn55.40:6.2: Idha, nandiya, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.40:6.5: So tena buddhe aveccappasādena santuṭṭho na uttari vāyamati divā pavivekāya, rattiṃ paṭisallānāya.
sn55.40:6.6: Tassa evaṃ pamattassa viharato pāmojjaṃ na hoti.
sn55.40:7.1: Puna caparaṃ, nandiya, ariyasāvako dhamme … pe …
sn55.40:7.3: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi … pe …
sn55.40:7.5: So tehi ariyakantehi sīlehi santuṭṭho na uttari vāyamati divā pavivekāya rattiṃ paṭisallānāya.
sn55.40:7.6: Tassa evaṃ pamattassa viharato pāmojjaṃ na hoti.
sn55.40:7.13: Evaṃ kho, nandiya, ariyasāvako pamādavihārī hoti.
sn55.40:8.2: Idha, nandiya, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.40:8.5: So tena buddhe aveccappasādena asantuṭṭho uttari vāyamati divā pavivekāya rattiṃ paṭisallānāya.
sn55.40:8.6: Tassa evaṃ appamattassa viharato pāmojjaṃ jāyati.
sn55.40:9.1: Puna caparaṃ, nandiya, ariyasāvako dhamme … pe …
sn55.40:9.3: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi … pe …
sn55.40:9.5: So tehi ariyakantehi sīlehi asantuṭṭho uttari vāyamati divā pavivekāya rattiṃ paṭisallānāya.
sn55.40:9.6: Tassa evaṃ appamattassa viharato pāmojjaṃ jāyati.
sn55.40:9.13: Evaṃ kho, nandiya, ariyasāvako appamādavihārī hotī”ti.
